attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My wife and I are on a fixed income. There will come a point where we can no longer pay ever increasing rises in taxation, council tax, utility charges etc. Our quality of life has been eroded to the point where we can no longer aford the things that you and your parlimentary colleagues take for granted such as holidays. Please stop fiddling inflation figures and at least recognise that it is getting harder for us to have a worthwhile existance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
